statements.statement: SELECT TOP 1 NO_O_ID FROM NEW_ORDER WHERE NO_D_ID = ? AND NO_W_ID = ? ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC
SELECT D_NEXT_O_ID,D_TAX FROM DISTRICT WHERE D_W_ID = ? AND D_ID = ?
SELECT S_QUANTITY, S_DATA, S_DIST_01, S_DIST_02, S_DIST_03, S_DIST_04, S_DIST_05, S_DIST_06, S_DIST_07, S_DIST_08, S_DIST_09, S_DIST_10 FROM STOCK WHERE S_I_ID = ? AND S_W_ID = ?
SELECT TOP 1 O_ID, O_CARRIER_ID, O_ENTRY_D FROM OORDER WHERE O_W_ID = ? AND O_D_ID = ? AND O_C_ID = ? ORDER BY O_ID DESC
